name: LowPolyTaxiSim Beta
description:
LowPolyTaxiSim Beta

Get passengers to their destinations before time runs out!

Make sure your gas tank is full!

And be a perfect taxi driver!

Controls:

WASD: Car Control

Space: HandBrake

Tab: Open City Map

Thanks for downloading and playing! Have Fun! Game Developer: Halil Eren Yazıcı

*Game Language: Turkish.

*Other languages will be added in full version.
